headline: Can Akamai (AKAM) Regain Growth and Investor Confidence with New Offerings?
summary: Akamai Technologies Inc. (NASDAQ:AKAM) is one of the worst-performing data center stocks in 2025. Its stock’s performance has been quite weak (-20.5%) this year. The Goldman Sachs analyst, Gabriela Borges, captured the essence of this underperformance in her note in mid-August. She wrote that the stock may continue to remain rangebound until it shows an apparent […]
